item.title: Database Indexes Explained to Software Developers
item.description: “You’d better index your database!” As a software engineer, you’ve probably heard this sentence a few times. This blog post will guide you through understanding how indexing works. The code in this blog post executes by order of appearance. So I encourage you to follow along by copy/pasting it in a notebook. I used Python 3.9. You’ll the following dependencies: pip install bplustree faker numpy tqdm. A minimal database in Python First, we will need a minimal database in Python.
